Class FixedFrequencyScale

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hsb.ms.syn.common.audio.Scale
      • de.hsb.ms.syn.common.audio.FixedFrequencyScale
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class FixedFrequencyScale
extends Scale
    Special fixed frequency scale used by LFO nodes to hold their modulating data algorithm
    See Also:
